lego: to start talking as soon as you can
practice_phrases: I want to start talking as soon as you can.
我想尽快开始说话。
You start talking as soon as you can.
你尽快开始说话。
She wants to start talking as soon as you can.
她想尽快开始说话。
We will start talking as soon as you can.
我们会尽快开始说话。
I like to start talking as soon as you can.
我喜欢尽快开始说话。
You have to start talking as soon as you can before going.
你在走之前必须尽快开始说话。
People who speak Chinese start talking as soon as you can.
会说中文的人尽快开始说话。
I'm going to start talking as soon as you can because I want to meet people.
我会尽快开始说话因为我想认识人。
Will you help me to start talking as soon as you can?
你会帮我尽快开始说话吗？
Before I have to go, I want to start talking as soon as you can.
在我必须走之前，我想尽快开始说话。

seed_context.known: 尽快开始说话是有用的。
seed_context.target: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.

我喜欢开始跟人说话。

I want to start talking as soon as you can.

practice_phrases: I want to talk.
我想说话。
You talk to me.
你跟我说话。
She wants to talk to people.
她想跟人说话。
We like to talk more soon.
我们喜欢很快多说话。
I don't like to talk before going.
我不喜欢在走之前说话。

你必须跟会说中文的人说话。
I'm going to talk as soon as possible.
我会尽快说话。
Will you help me to talk to her before I have to go?
在我必须走之前你会帮我跟她说话吗？

我喜欢感觉好像我准备好说话了。
I want to start talking as soon as you can.
我想尽快开始说话。

practice_phrases: This is useful.
这是有用的。
Talking is useful.
说话是有用的。
Learning her name is useful to me.
学她的名字对我是有用的。
Meeting people is useful before going.
见人在走之前是有用的。
Starting to talk as soon as possible is useful.
尽快开始说话是有用的。
I like feeling as if talking to people is useful.
我喜欢感觉好像跟人说话是有用的。
Talking to people who speak Chinese is useful because I want to learn.
跟会说中文的人说话是有用的因为我想学。
Will you help me? This is useful before I have to go.
你会帮我吗？这在我必须走之前是有用的。
I'm going to start soon because talking more is useful.
我会很快开始因为多说话是有用的。
It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
尽快开始说话是有用的。

practice_phrases: This is useful.
这很有用。
Talking is useful.
说话很有用。
Learning is useful to me.
学习对我很有用。
Meeting people is very useful soon.
见人很快很有用。
I like talking because it is useful.
我喜欢说话因为它很有用。
Starting to talk as soon as possible is useful to you.
尽快开始说话对你很有用。
People who speak Chinese find talking useful before going.
会说中文的人发现在走之前说话很有用。
Will you help me? I want to learn because it's useful.
你会帮我吗？我想学因为它很有用。
I'm nearly ready to go, but talking more is still useful.
我快准备好走了，但是多说话还是很有用。
It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
尽快开始说话是有用的。
